# hasSmile

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether a smile is detected in the face.

## Declaration

```swift
var hasSmile: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

To detect smiles, `/CIDetector/featuresInImage:options:` needs to be called with the [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIDetectorSmile] option set to true.

## Identifying Facial Features

- **hasLeftEyePosition**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the detector found the face’s left eye.
- **hasRightEyePosition**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the detector found the face’s right eye.
- **hasMouthPosition**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the detector found the face’s mouth.
- **leftEyePosition**: The image coordinate of the center of the left eye.
- **rightEyePosition**: The image coordinate of the center of the right eye.
- **mouthPosition**: The image coordinate of the center of the mouth.
- **leftEyeClosed**: A Boolean value that indicates whether a closed left eye is detected in the face.
- **rightEyeClosed**: A Boolean value that indicates whether a closed right eye is detected in the face.
